control.visible: substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,divx) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,div2) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,div3) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,div4) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,divx 4) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,div5) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,dx50)

substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,bluray) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,blu-ray) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,bdrip) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,brrip) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,bd25) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,bd50)

[substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,.img,Right) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,dvd) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,.ifo,Right) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,.vob,Right) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,dvdrip) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,dvdr5) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,.r5) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,dvdscreener) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,dvdscr) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,screener)] + ![substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,hddvd) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,hd-dvd)]

substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,divx) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,div2) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,div3) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,div4) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,divx 4) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,div5) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,dx50)
